job.title: NLP Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><u>Job Description:</u></p><ul><li>Conducting research in the area of Language and Conversation AI, advancing the state of the art.</li><li>Efficiently implementing algorithms, defining data sets and benchmarks and running experiments on real data.</li><li>Constantly reviewing relevant literature to identify emerging methods or technologies and current best practices.</li><li>Following the market, products and understanding customer needs, to find innovative solutions to real customer problems.</li><li>Developing algorithms as software components and supporting their integration into actual products.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><u>Roles and Responsibilities:</u></p><ul><li>PhD/M.Tech/B.Tech in computer science or related fields / 3-6 years of work experience in fields of Natural Language Processing and Deep Learning.</li><li>Deep and broad understanding of foundations up to state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning techniques, including hands-on experience with deep learning frameworks.</li><li>Experience in designing deep learning architectures, as well as implementing in a real-world setting.</li><li>Familiarity with NLP concepts and related tasks, such as language modeling, neural retrieval &amp; generation, text classification &amp; NER, machine translation, summarization.</li><li>Familiarity with AWS stack and cloud deployment.</li><li>Hands on experience in writing code in Python.</li><li>Innovative thinking, creativity, and self-learning preferred</li></ul>
